thread.title: Free Coaching E-Learning Module Made Available Today on Executive Leadership Website
thread.title_full: Free Coaching E-Learning Module Made Available Today on Executive Leadership Website

author: admin
title: Free Coaching E-Learning Module Made Available Today on Executive Leadership Website
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/10/2015 @ 1:20 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Coach2Lead 
WESTERVILLE, Ohio, Sept. 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Coach2Lead announced today the free availability of the first training module of the Coach2Lead online e-learning program. The training is designed for individuals and organizations looking to peel off the outdated label of "manager" and take on the role of genuine industry leader. The free information can be instantly downloaded at http://www.Coach2Lead.biz . 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150910/265469 
In this free e-learning module, leaders will learn the science that explains why performance coaching is one of the most important leadership skills they can develop and is so effective in bringing out the best in the people they lead. They will also receive the companion 46-page Participant Field Guide and a full program overview. 
"Most executives and leaders are struggling to harness the best thinking and focused action of each employee in their organization," said Tom Rausch, certified executive coach and culture consultant of Coach2Lead. "By making this information available for free, we're hoping to educate more people about how to unleash innovation, bolster teamwork, and encourage collaboration through this transformative online learning experience." 
For more information, visit http://coach2lead.biz/who-uses-coach-2-lead/free-preview . 
Questions can be directed to 614-787-6826 or email tom@leadershipbeyondlimits.com. 
About www.Coach2Lead.biz 
Founded by international executive coach Tom Rausch of Leadership Beyond Limits, Coach2Lead has transformed large, small and global organizations by changing ordinary managers into extraordinary leaders. Leadership Beyond Limits created Coach2Lead to provide accessible blended learning training that is designed for executives and organizations who want to grow as leaders; and for executive coaches who want to have a powerful program to incorporate into their offerings. Find out more at www.Coach2Lead.biz . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/free-coaching-e-learning-module-made-available-today-on-executive-leadership-website-300141054.html 
SOURCE Coach2Lead
